inverse-mode.description: Alarm reversion mode, which can be Forbid Reversion, Auto Resume, or Manual Resume.

traps.description: List of the settings of the NMS host.

feature-name.description: Module to which a trap belongs.

alarm-name.description: Name of an alarm, it is case sensitive.

clear-suppress-time.description: Suppression period after which an alarm is cleared.

cause-suppress-time.description: Suppression period after which an alarm is generated.

module-name.description: Module to which an alarm belongs.

active-alarm.description: Statistics of information about an active alarm.

sequence.description: Sequence number of an active alarm.

generated-time.description: Time when an active alarm is generated.

rootkind-flag.description: Flag indicating a root or correlative alarm.

rootalarm-sequence.description: Sequence number of a root alarm.

vsname.description: Name of the source VS where an active alarm resides.

history-alarm.description: Statistics of information about a historical alarm.

alarm-sequence.description: Sequence number of a historical alarm.

generated-time.description: Time when a historical alarm is generated.

cleared-time.description: Time when a historical alarm is cleared.

reason.description: Reason ID of a historical alarm.

vsname.description: Name of the source VS where a historical alarm resides.
